companies.title: beBit Inc - Full Stack Engineer
experience: Developed the backend API endpoints & MySQL DB connections using Django & Django Rest Framework.
Implementing & maintaining features for the frontend using Vue.JS & Node.js
Built the REST API service for 3 features (segmented-trends, user-trends, repeat-search) that executes the AWS Athena queries & paginates the results which is then parsed in Django for the frontend.

Upgraded deprecated packages, severity issues & improved development experience for other developers in other teams (e.g. Generating Makefiles, upgrade Django 1.10 to 1.11, Python 2.7 to 3.7, creating new Docker images etc).

companies.title: ikkai Inc - Lead Senior Engineer
experience: Created cloud services for the platform using Lambda & Api Gateway in AWS.
Managed cloud data, including fixing data discrepancies.
Created Api endpoints & backend features in Django.
Implementing frontend UI components & web app features using ReactJS, Redux, Webpack & Node.js
As the lead & engineering supervisor I upskilled interns & other engineers (Japanese & English).
